  • HTTP API - v2
  • User Endpoints
  • PUT /user

PUT /user

https://http.cloud.tiny-mesh.com/v2/user
200 OK – A User object
400 Bad Request – A generic error object when invalid data was given
401 Unauthorized – A Error object
403 Forbidden – Fails with a Error object due to failed authentication, or using a non-user token

Description

Patches the user resource with request data. If any validation failed, or authentication failed the response will be a HTTP Error
